item.title: [Help] Rsps Bot Scripting
item.dc:creator: @All_Time_Low All Time Low
item.description:
@All_Time_Low wrote:

So i wanna start scripting java for rsps server’s.

Like a bot that answers trivia bot’s.

Ex: if ((Chatbox.Line1) “What is the capital of Texas?”); {
then (Type = “::answer houston”);
}

                    if ((Chatbox.Line1) "What is the capital of California?"); {
        	then (Type = "::answer Sacramento");

}

Something like that, it’s just an example idk if your suppose to put it in like that.

Does anyone know how i can learn this?
Like a tutorial?

Read full topic
